title: almaza Pilsener Beer
content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/letterror/3662462784/in/set-72157620584705760/?addedcomment=1#comment72157622568624039](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013105620/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/letterror/3662462784/in/set-72157620584705760/?addedcomment=1#comment72157622568624039)  
almaza is apparently a slighly modified [FF Advert](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013105620/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_advert/) but what's the script? Where it says Pilsener Beer.
author: johnnydib
